text: Qalat or Kalat () is a historical town in Kalat District, Balochistan, Pakistan. Qalat is the capital of Qalat District and is known locally as Qalat-e Baluch. Qalat, formerly Qilat, is roughly in the center of Pakistani Balochistan, south and slightly west of the provincial capital Quetta. It was the capital of the Qalat Khanate. The Brahui population is almost completely Muslim. Image:QalatFlag.svg Image:Kalat Map.gif Image:Gate of Kelat.jpg Category:Former subdivisions of Pakistan Category:Pakistani princely states
title: Kalat, Pakistan
